thread.title: Bukas ang Europa: Nag-slide ang mga pagbabahagi bago ang pulong ng Fed rate
thread.title_full: Bukas ang Europa: Nag-slide ang mga pagbabahagi bago ang pulong ng Fed rate

author: Frank Prenesti
title: Bukas ang Europa: Nag-slide ang mga pagbabahagi bago ang pulong ng Fed rate
text:
Bukas ang Europa: Nag-slide ang mga pagbabahagi bago ang pulong ng Fed rate
Ang European shares ay bumukas nang mas mababa noong Martes habang ang lahat ng mga mata ay bumaling sa simula ng dalawang araw na pulong ng patakaran ng US Federal Reserve, na may mga inaasahan ng 25-basis point na pagbawas sa mga rate.
The pan-regional Stoxx 600 index was down 0.64% at 512 points in early trade. A decision from the Fed is expected Wednesday, after which attention will turn to the UK a day later, where the Bank of England is expected to keep rates on hold.
Germanyâ€™s Dax was flat after Chancellor Olaf Schulz lost a no-confidence vote in his government and called elections for February 23. All other major European bourses were lower.
In the UK, the unemployment rate was steady in the three months to October, while pay growth picked up, according to official figures released on Tuesday.
The unemployment rate came in at 4.3%, unchanged from the previous month. Meanwhile, average pay, including and excluding bonuses, rose 5.2%. This compares to 4.9% growth for regular earnings in the previous three months, and 4.4% for total earnings.
Sa mga balita sa equity, Bunzl shares slid after the company released a trading statement saying revenues would rise but would be held back by inflation and weaker volumes.
Pag-uulat ni Frank Prenesti para sa Sharecast.com
